"Happy birthday Katja, my heart is yours"
Moonlight shines so clear,
Moments like dreams draw near,
After rain, stars appear,
Awaiting a friend's words, I hold dear.
Her grace, like jewels so rare,
A bond with her, beyond compare,
Quietly, a wish in the air,
For her happiness, a lifetime's prayer.

"A Promise Under the Starry Sky"
Stars above twinkle and glow, recalling tales from long ago.
NiuLang and ZhiNÃ¼, their eternal song we know.
Souls mates are rare, found in a moment's spree,
The vast Milky Way, witnesses our eternity.
Piano notes rise high, under stars they serenely fly.
Echoes dance around, in the melody, you're the most profound.
Red sleeves scent the tale, with you, I'd journey without fail.
Stirring deep emotion, through time and space, an endless devotion.
Through mountains vast and rivers wide, true feelings can't be denied.
Time and space may part, but vows of my heart never depart.
On this Qixi fest, with an earnest heart, I travel the quest.
Dreams do come through, as NiuLang and ZhiNÃ¼ finally rendezvous!

Sweet surrender of finding
Oneâ€™s tired soul unwinding
Until life no longer matters;
Love unchains all its fetters.
Mirrored half of each otherâ€™s mess,
Aspiring always for nothing less
Than to love across lifeâ€™s pages,
Either together or apart for ages.

Katja, wrap me up in all your
I want you in my arms
Oh, let me hold you
I'll never let you go again like I did
Oh, I used to say
I would never fall in love again until I found her
I said, "I would never fall unless it's you I fall into"
I was lost within the darkness, but then I found her
I found you

When I'm in Berlin you're off to London
When I'm in New York you're doing Rome
All those crazy nights we spend together
As voices on the phone
Wishing we could be more telepathic
Tired of the nights I sleep alone
Wishing we could redirect the traffic
And we find ourselves a home
Can you feel the raindrops in the desert
Have you seen the sunrays in the dark
Do you feel my love when I'm not present
Standing by your side while miles apart
Sunshine in the rain
Love is still the same
Sunshine in the rain
Sunshine in the rain
Love is still the same
Sunshine in the rain

Hiding from the rain and snow
Trying to forget, but I won't let go
Looking at a crowded street
Listening to my own heartbeat
So many people all around the world
Tell me, where do I find someone like you, girl?
Take me to your heart, take me to your soul
Give me your hand before I'm old
Show me what love is, haven't got a clue
Show me that wonders can be true
They say nothing lasts forever
We're only here today
Love is now or never
Bring me far away
Take me to your heart, take me to your soul
Give me your hand and hold me
Show me what love is, be my guiding star
It's easy, take me to your heart

I'll be your dream, I'll be your wish, I'll be your fantasy
I'll be your hope, I'll be your love, be everything that you need
I love you more with every breath truly, madly, deeply do
I will be strong, I will be faithful 'cause I'm counting on
A new beginnin'
A reason for livin'

I wanna stand with you on a mountain

I wanna lay like this forever
Until the sky falls down on me

Oh, can you see it, baby?
You don't have to close your eyes
It's standin' right before you
All that you need will surely come

Wise men say

If I can't help falling in love with you

Shall I stay, would it be a sin?

The other night, dear

When I awoke, dear
I was mistaken
So I hung my head and I cried
You are my sunshine
My only sunshine
You make me happy
When skies are gray
You'll never know, dear
How much I love you
Please don't take
My sunshine away

To see you once again
My love

"With you in my life, I vow to spend a lifetime"
In one glance, a bond for eternity found,
Destined to find you, the happiness profound.
The world has its limits, yet our love unbound.
Universe brought you, it's fate, so astounded.
May the years we look back with glee,
Promise to be with you for eternity.
At the rainbow's end we will meet,
Like colorful phoenixes, our hearts will beat in harmony, our fate complete.

Heaven is that moment when I look into your eyes.
And oh I just fall in love again
Just one touch and then it happens every time
There I go by, just fall in love again and when I do
I can't help myself, I fall in love with you

"Wife you've worked hard, hubby loves you"
The heavens favor those who works hard,
Like autumn trees, dancing in the chilly dark.
Lucky to have you dear, you warm up my heart,
I pray in dreams, a life together we will start.
Time marches on, but my heart's still young,

"Homeward Song for Katja"
Chasing the sun on a plane, but time won't be outrun,
Every sight reminds me of your smile and the warmth of your sun.
From ancient Pingyao's streets to temples so grand,
My thoughts always revolved around holding your hand.
The red sunset's glow ignites my burning desire,
Wishing for wings to fly to you, set my heart on fire.
Early mornings, late nights, in your love, I confide,
To cherish you eternally, with you, I'll abide.
In this vast world, you're the only one I hold dear,
My heart's devoted to you, the god will hear.
Our souls intertwined, like phoenixes we glide,
Hand in hand, we'll explore life's endless tide.
With you as my star, I live in your warm grace,
Explore the world togethet, we'll be in each other's brace.
Together we'll venture, through joy and through strife,
Forever and always, you're the love of my life.

'Cause I believe that destiny
Is out of our control
And you'll never live until you love
With all your heart and soul

'Cause I believe that destiny
Is out of our control
And you'll never live until you love
With all your heart and soul
If I asked would you say yes?
Together we're the very best

Everyday I love you

Everyday I love you

There's a calm surrender
To the rush of day

An enchanted moment
And it sees me through
It's enough for this restless warrior
Just to be with you

And can you feel the love tonight?
It is where we are
It's enough for this wide-eyed wanderer
That we got this far
And can you feel the love tonight
How it's laid to rest?
It's enough to make kings and vagabonds

Believe the very best

It's beautiful life
Forever I'll stay by your side
It's beautiful life
Always standing right behind you
Beautiful love
Cause we're standing under the same sky Even though we are world's apart
Beautiful life
Beautiful day
Though I am only living in memories
Beautiful life
Beautiful day
Won't you let me inside your heart
Beautiful my love
Beautiful your heart
It's beautiful life
It's beautiful life

"Yearning under the moon so bright,
a love song on an autumn night."

When will I be in your embrace, the moment so right?

â€™Twould be tonight in the palace on high.
Riding the wind, there I would fly,

Too high and cold for me.
I rise and dance, with my shadow I play.
On high as on earth, would it be as gay?

The moon goes round the mansions red
Through gauze-draped window soft to shed
Her light upon the sleepless bed.
Why then when people part, is the oft full and bright?
Men have sorrow and joy; they part or meet again;
The moon is bright or dim and she may wax or wane.
There has been nothing perfect since the olden days.
So let us wish that man
Will live long as he can!
Though miles apart, weâ€™ll share the beauty she displays.
